answers.answer: I had a friend who was an alcoholic. At first I did not know of her addiction. She had the loveliest sweet smell that was personal and had nothing to do with perfume. I guess the smell was related to her alcoholism. I'm sorry your husband doesn't smell better. Maybe it has to do with the kind of alcohol they drink.

Please get diabetes checked.....my grandfather went into a coma and we always smelt this fruit sweet smell all the time....the Dr said his sugar was too high and he went into a coma...and I (think) he said the alcohol maybe had something.g to do with the sweet smell...sorry got it all mixed up just get his sugar checked......

Good comment about the diabetes. My husband has type II diabetes and occasionally gets that fruity smell. But he is not an alcoholic. In fact he hardly drinks at all - maybe a glass of wine at a family party. But, yes, the husband of the questioner should be checked for diabetes.

question: My husband has been an alcoholic for about 25 years.  For the past year I have noticed a sickly sweet body odor, this is a continuous odor even right out of the shower.  Drinking or not.  What could be the most common causes of this?
title: sickly sweet body odor
